title: House for Sale in Dehiwala
details:
** Five bedroom house located in Quarry
road dehiwala.
** No of floors: Two floors, with two attach
bathroom and one common bathroom
including separate servant bathroom.
** separate entrance for 1st floor,
foundation for an extra floor.

** Location :A minute walk to Gateway
college dehiwala and walking distance
to supermarkets and restaurants

***Size: 5.75 purches

***Extras: 3 Phace electricity meter
separate kitchen upper floor.
***Upper floor approved for separate address including separate water meter .

****peace and calm area****
